div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo primo die mensis februarij anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo vijo

The said day mastir alexander bisset solempnitly protestit
that he fell in nay pley anent his inland liand in the vuirkirk
gate quhilkis he inhabitis clamit to pay certane annuell to
the frething of the forland pertenyng to alexander tailyour
and quhat that was done befor the prouest and bailyeis in
the premiss' turne him to nay preiudice

The said day the bailyes chargit normund lesly at command
of the bailyes chargit androw nauchtj to reman within the
tolbutht vnto the tyme he deliuer the pot clamit be Wilyeam
smitht eftir the tenour of an' act' maid tharupoun' obefor

The said day the aldirman and counsale present for the tyme grantit and consentit
tile allowe to James Colisone tua markis vsuale money of Scotlande
in his Witsonday maile next to Cum of his tak of fischingis of the
wattir of Done becaus' it was fundin he hed' pait It Obefor in Salmond'
to the vys' of the kirk werk be the aldirman and counsale

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die mensis
februarij anno quo supra

The said day gilbert pert and his wif robert Wat and his wif William Inuor and
his wif thome brian and his wif Johnne blitht and his wif Johne' ramsay and his wif
Johne' nicholson' and his wif Johnne andirson' and his wif androw Jesse and his wif
Johne nicholson' yongar and his wif William patonson' and his wif gelis for
him and his wif Johne mathouson' and his wif thomas towy and his wif William
Wallace and his wif William Daueson' and his wif thome pipar and his wif and
Donald and his wif quhitfischearis was conuict' be ane suorn' assis' thomas
lesly forspekar that thai culd nocht acquyt ale the said personis for
the wranguis' Selling of fische at the schoir to the land men or
thai be present to the mercat for the quhilkis Ilkane of thame was
in ane amerciament of the court and' to amend as law wile
and forbeir in tyme to cum et cetera

Alsua the said persoune was conuict' be ane suorne assis' thomas
lesly forspekar for the Selling of quhit fische in gret in hunderis
and half hunderis to land men' or the toun' be seruit And for the
denying to sell thair fische in smale quantite to the induellaris
of the tone in penny worthis and tua penny worthis for the
quhilk Ilkan' of thame was in ane amerciament of the court
and' to amend as law wile et cetera

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the prouest
bailyes and counsaill that nay quhit fische be sellit at the
schoir nor batis quhile thai be presentit to the mercat to land
men' in gret Item that the fischearis sale sell thair fische
to the toune puyr and riche in penny worthis and tua penny
worthis in smale and gret quhile the tone be seruit and
to nay land men' quhile the toune be sted and that thai sale
hous' nay fische quhile thai be presentit to the mercat obefor
And' that the regratouris and tappatis by nay fische
in gret bot to serue tham' self nor nan fischear nor fischearis
wifis sell nay fische to tham in gret bot it that wile serue tham' self
quhil thre eftir none / And that this fischearis and fischearis
seruandis sale keipe the fische croice and cum nocht on the west part
of the hoill of the common' gate And' quha that brekis ony poynt
befor writin and beis conuict' tharof sale pay the amerciamentis of
the court and' tene s' to sanct nicholes werk vneforgevin and'
the amerciamentis bigane

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorn' assis' thomas lesly forspekar
that androu nauchtj ane of the officiaris of the said burgh' hed wrangit in
the brekin of the ward' out passand' of the tolbutht of the said burgh' eftir
that he was chargit be normond' lesly officiar at command' of the bailyes
to reman within the tolbuth' of the samyn ay and quhile he deliuerit an' pot
to William smitht eftir the tenour of ane act' maid obefor for the quhilkis he
was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo die
mensis februarij anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta coram honorabilibus virum gilberto menyes preposito Johanne mar Dauid mar et Willelmo
portar tribus balliuorum burgj de abirdene In pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti penultimo
die mensis februarij anno Domini millesimo quinto septimo subscripti valet alexandrum gray Dauid
andirson' thomam Waus Willelmum futhes matheum branche patricium chernsid' patri
cium rede andream stratone Johannem arthour Willelmum murray Willelmum cheshame Johannem
andirson' andream louson' henricium red' et andream steuinsone burgenses dictj burgj Qui
Jurati dicunt quod quondam alexander beuerlay burgensis dicti burgj frater Willelmum beuirlay latoris
presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de
quadam terra cum pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum extra portam vicj furcarum ex orientali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram alexandrum rolland ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Willelmi
prat ex boreali patribus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens Et quod
dictus Willelmus est legittime et propinquior heres dicti quondam alexandri fratris suj de dicta terra
cum petinenciis et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annuum octo solidos
et valuit iiijor solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de suppremo domino
nostro rege per seriucium burgagium Et quod dicta terra nunc cum pertinenciji vale tenetur
in captie de suppremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existit
In manibus domini nostri regis legittime per se ipsum ob decessum quondam Isabelle Donaldson'
Relicte sponse ipsius alexandri coniunctam infeodacionem eiusdem terre habentis per spacium
dimidij annj aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis
datis et clausis sub Sigillo dicti balliuj et Sigillis quorunndam quj
huic Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum Anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johne' of Kintor
forspekar that gif androw lousone wile depon' be his aitht that
alexander lammynton' is awing to him tua merkis of the Some of
xiiij li' and' ix s' the borgh' fundin one the said alexander be
him is awaile and' the said alexander sale pay the said tua
merkis and gif the said androw wile nocht depon' as said is the
said borgh' is of non awaile and the said alexander quiett' of
his challance

head.add: the prising of ane ring present be Androw murray

div.p:
The said' day Comperit Normond' lesly ane of the officiaris of the said
burgh' and schew and respond' that at the command' of Johnne of mar ane
of the baillies of the said burgh' he ressauit ane gold' ring fra Dauid murray
on' the behalf of Androu murray his fadir to ger prise the said ring at the mercat
cors' of the said burgh' for certane money awing to the said Androu for the
quhilkis the said Ring was plegeit to hyme And' the said day comperit Dauid
Theman Dauid brois' goldsmythtis lauchfully warnit and chargit tharto Quhilkis
deponit be thar aithez that thai at command' of the said officiar chargeing tham
in the kingis nayme prouoist and baillies to prise the said ring And' that the said
officiar present the said ring at the merkat crois' of the said burgh' the v day of the
monetht of februar' the yer of god jM vC and sevin yeris and' thai prisit the said' ring
till aucht merkis and' hald a merk be thar aithez and consciens the wecht of
the Ross' noble till tua merkis the secund' day of process' Item the xij day of the said monetht the said'
officiar' present the said ring to the said merkat cors' to be prisit for the said money
quhilkis the saidez Dauid theman and Dauid broys' prisit to viij merkis and demi the noble'
wecht tua merkisItem the xix day of the said monetht of februar the
thrid day of process' the said officiar present the said ring to the said merkat
cors' to be prisit for the said money Quhilkis the saidez Dauid theman and
Dauid brois' prisit the samyn as said Is Item the xxv day of the said'
monetht the said officiar prisit prisit the said ring as ferd' day of process'
to the said merkat cors' to be apprisit for the said money quhilkis the said Dauid
and Dauid apprisit the said ring to viij merkis and demj as said' Is for the pament
of the Some' awand' to the said Androu The quhilk ring being apprisit the said offi
ciar be werteu of his office perofferit it to sell till ony personys that wald' by
the said ring and' gif maist for It or pay the sovme' that it was prisit to And'
chargit the said officiar to pas' and befor sufficient witnes offir the said
ring to the awanar' and' gif he refusit It to deliuer It to the creditor that the
money is awing to And gif the said ring excedis the det to deliuer the excrescence
tharof the awar' of the said' ring

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio
die mensis marcij Anno quo supra

The said day thomas lammyntone was in ane amerciament of the court be
his avin toung grant in his wifis name for the selling of xij penny
aill /

The said day canne cullan was maid quyt be ane suorn' assis' thomas
chamer forspekar of ale tribulance done be hir to ser Dauid liell or
to Dovny baxtar and his wif and' thai quyt of ale tribulance of the
said Agnes cullan

The said day allane serray litstar with thomas lesly his forspekar follouit
Jonet rolland / for his airschip / pertenyng to him be deces' of his fadir
the said Jonet witht Johne cullan his forspekar allegijt that the said'
allan hed sauld' and annalijt his arschip and the richt tharof to
the said Jonet and tuk ane day to preiw the samyn and thai assignit
monunday cum viij dais to bring hir prewis to preiw lauchfully the
said airschipe sauld to hir et cetera

The saide day James Colisone Solemptlie protestit in the nayme of Dauid
arrot and Duncane portar that quhat happinnis to be done anent the skinnis follouit
be Alexander hay et cetera turne thame to nay preiudice et cetera

The saide day Williame cheishame protestit that quhat happinnis to de done
anent the Skinnis follouit be Alexander hay turne him to nay preiudice

The said day William genor and thom' pipar grantit to pay to Dauid fynne
Ilkane of tham iij s' vj d' and gif the laif of the boitis schippin pait samekle to him

add.foreign: continuacio plegium saccj lane symonis ellon'

div.p:
The said day the borgh' fundin be mathour branche paritry patry red' et cetera on'
Duncan crak robert red and vtheris merchandis et cetera anent the castin of an sacc'
of woll pertenyng to symon ellone is continewit with consent of batht the said partiis to mo
nunday the xiij day of the monetht of merche instant in sic forme and effect as it standis
nowe et cetera

The said day the borgh' fundin be alexander hay on patry red and Johne crak for the wranguis
castin of ane pynnakill of wole skynnis out of ane schip et cetera contenyng vxx and x wole
skynnis with consent of baitht the said partiis was put to the decisione of thir personis chosin
and suorn' in ane assis' that is to say Johne cullan thomas chamer patry chirnsid androw stra
tone Duncan fif cristofir prat Dauid arrot Johne' portar Duncan crak Johne' arthour androw
stevinsone alexander burnat Dauid fynne androw litstar and patry arthour quhilkis riply auisit
the richtis resonis and allegacionis of baitht the said partiis herd sene considirit and vndirstand'
fand and' deliuerit witnes and' previs producit the said borgh' of nan awaile as it
was strikin be the montht of Johne of cullan forspekar of the said assis' for the quhilk
the said alexander was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day Dauid murray offerit him in the name of his fadir to refund and pay to James
colisone incontinent ale thing that he can preiw sufficiently his fadir awing to him et cetera

The said day Johne Kennertj grantit him awing to thomas menyeis iij barrellis of
salmond fule red and suet merchand gud of the richtuis bind of abirdene
to be pait at lammes that nixt cumis or within xv dais thareftir for ane
half nethis fischingis of the furdis set to him quhilkis thre barrellis
of Salmonde he oblist him to pay be the fatht of his body et cetera

div.head: The money lent to the kirkwerk the yer' of gode jM vc and vij yeris
div.p:
The saide day the aldirman and Alexander gray mastir of the kirkwerk grauntit that
thir personis eftir writin hede lent the Somes of money follouing to the pament of
thar Stallis and kirk werk of thar malys of the Witsonday terme to cum at the request
of the toune for the expedicioun' of thar werk to the plesour of gode That is to say
James Colisone xxvj s' and viij d' William futhes xxviij s' / Alexander gray fourtj s' Androw
Cullane fourtj s' the aldirman fourtj s' the widew of Jonhne ratre tuentj s' / the Relict of
Alexander rede fourtj s' / mastir James Cumin tuentj four' s' / Alexander malysone tuenti s'
mathou branche tuentj s' and Robert Crag xxviij s'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis marcij
anno quo supra

The saide day the borghe' fundin one patry chernsid' be Androw litstar in the handis
of Jonhne Cuyk officiar' that quahwar' he tuk the saide patrys' haile Inlande
in the gallougate fra the bak of the forchamere donvart to the yerde ende with the
draucht betuix It and the forchamere and ale vthir asiamentis within the saide yettis
with vsche and entre at the samyn Ande that the saide patry aucht to deliuer
him the keis of the samyn quhat tyme It ples' him to gang and entir tharto
was fundin availe be ane Suorne assis' ser Jonhne ruthirfurd' forspekar for the quhilkis
the saide patry was in Amerciament of the Court et cetera and awe to deliuer the keis to the saide
Androw et cetera and that was gevin for dome

The saide day the borghe fundin one Androw litstar be patrik chernsid' for the wranguis'
Occupacioun of his hale of his lande in the gallougat was fundin of nayn avale
be ane Suorne assis' ser Johne ruthirfurde forspekar for the quhilkis the said patry
was in Amerciament of the court et cetera and that was gevin for dome

The saide day Jonet rollande the relict of William senior litstar one that ane part Ande
Alane litstar his Sone one that vthir was bundin and Oblist be the fathtis of
thar bodiis to stande and abide at the deliuerance and ordinance of gilbert menyeis
prouest malcome Crag chosin be the saide Jonet Johne mar' and thomas Waus
chosin be the saide Alane arbitouris and amicabile componitouris anent the airschip of gudis
clamit be the saide Alane throu deces' of his said' fadir quhilkis sale deliuer and giffurtht
thar decret herapoun' within xv dais hereftir be thar conscience or aithtis Ande gif thai
aggre nocht thai sale cheis' ane ourman' be avis' of the saide partiis

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to Thome Walcar' Sone
to Williame Wlacar' at Drum tile ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be gilbert litstar
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane pece of blew clatht rav vnwalkit perte
ning to Williame of Johnestone gevin to him to walk and dicht et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimotercio
die mensis marcij Anno quosupra

The said day Comperit Syme of Ellone with alexander gray his forspekar
and deliuerit ane summondis of our Souerane lordis raisit one patrik Red' Johnne
craik and mathou branche for the wrang castin of ane Sak of woll out
of ane schip of the said burgh' callit the Anne and renuncit the said summondis
and' all persewt of It in tym tocum Ande referrit the said mater to the
decisioun' of ane assis' and admittit the assis' tharto in sic strintht as
It was befor the lordis of our Souerane lordis counsaill To the quhilkis the
saidez patrik Johnne and mathou consentit in all thingis

head.add: Ellone Reid' crak branche and the merchandis'

div.p:
The said day Symon Ellone with alexander gray his forspekar
follouit patry reid' Johnne crak and mathou branche for the wranguis'
castin and distructioun' of ane serplaitht of woll contenyng iiijxx s'
aucht stanys as he allegis out of ane schip callit the barg of Abirdene
in the sey in the monetht of September last bigane eftir the tenour of
oure souerane lordis lettres Impetrat' tharapone / quhilkis the said patrik Johnne
and mathou denyit / Quhilk actioun' was put to the decisioun' of thir personis
that is to say Dauid menyeis of petfodellis Johnne lesly of warderis thomas chamer
of quyltis Dauid andersone James collisone thomas Waus Duncan collisone
Androu straton' malcome crag alexander abirdour Johnne ramsay Androu
meldrum patry lesly yonger thomas chamer Dauid synne Androu stevinson'
Alexander burnat Androu litster and James gourlay burges of the said
burgh' Quhilkis riplie auisit the greit aitht suorne the Richtis ressonis
and allegaciounis witnes preiffis witnes and preiffis of baitht the said partijs
herd' seyne considirit and vnderstandin all in ane voice concordand'
Deliuerit and fand' that thai culd' nocht acquit the saidez' patry Johnne crak
and mathou branche of the castin of the serplaitht of woll in the sey ffor
the quhilkis ilkane of tham was inamerciament of the court sic as thai
aucht to tyne of law and' till amend' and mak satisfacioun' to the said
Symone et cetera And that was gevin for dome

The said day patry reid' mathou branche' and Johnne craik followit
Robert reid' Dauid futhes Alexander Kintor Johnne portar Duncan
craik Dauid Arrot Alexander horne Dauid bannerman Williame cheisham
Johnne Wilyongsone Duncan portat Williame still and Androu burnat
for the releving of thame of part of the said Sek of woll pertening
to Symon Ellone quhilkis denyit that thai aucht to releyve thaim
of ony part of the said Sek And thareftir with consent of baitht the said
partijs the said actioun' was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' of the
personis befor writin Quhilkis riplie auisit the richtis allegacionis
witnes and preiffis of baitht the said partijs herd sene considirit and vndir
standin / deliuerit all in ane voice concordand' that thai culd' nocht
acquit the saidez Robert Reid' Dauid futhes Alexander Kintor and
Johnne portar of the castin of the said Sak of woll and that thai aucht
to releyve thame of the samyn part part lik And'
the saidez Duncan craik Dauid Arrot Alexander horne Dauid bannerman
Willeame cheishame Johnne Wilyongsone Duncan portar William
still and Androu burnat was quyt of the castin of the saide woll Ande
that was gevin for dome

The said day James collisoun' tuk him to preif on' mononday that nixt
cummys that Androu murray eldar was awing him thre bollis of
malt and a laid' of aitis And' the baillies ordanit quhat officiar
that the said James wald' tak to pas' and warne In his preiffis agan
the said day

The said day comperit ser Johnne Waus chaplane and follouit mario
ry craik the relict' of vmquhile Johnne the Waus his fadir of certane
gudes of airschip and hous' maill pertenyng to him be deceis' of his said
fadir quhilk gudis and hous' maill the said mariory referrit to the said ser
Johnnez aitht that quhat that he wald' depone and mak faitht of befor his
Jug ordinar that scho suld' mak him pament tharof

The said' day the prouest ande balyeis with awis' of the assis' assignit
friday that next cumis to Symond' Ellone and Alexander gray his forspekar
to preiwe the valour' of the Sacc of Skinnis wole castin in the sey out of
the Schip callit the Anne for the quhilkis patry rede Jonhne Craik
was conuict as in the Actis maide tharupon' obefor is contenit

The saide day being personalie present in the court Dauid bannerman accusit for the
forstalling of the burghe' in bying of Skinnis Regrating in taping of
tar' Salt Irne and vthir smale merchandice put him in wile et cetera for the quhilkis
he was in Amerciamentis of the courtis be his avne tounge grantis and tile amende
as law wile and forber' in tyme to cum et cetera Ande Dauid bannerman burges of
the saide burghe his brothir become Souerte for his vnlavis be hs hande
and gudis

The saide day it was ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman and counsale present for the
tyme that thai salbe thre par' torchis xij prekatis and ij dusan' assis' of
wax maid' to be deliuerit to the kingis hienes and wyne be discrecioun' of the
prouest to giddir with sex li' of Skorgeatis
